AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Proposed change of use from Herbal Medicine shop to a Restaurant (Use Class E) (Opening Hours Tuesday-Sunday 11am-11pm)
decision_conditions: The proposed use of the land as a restaurant would not involve development as defined by Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) and the site is not subject to any planning restrictions regarding hours of operation.
Please provide 'Time Stamp Photo'. It is validation requirement.

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the trees or reduce its amenity value. Recommendation: No objections
